title: Sudden Summer Breeze
description: In the aftermath of an unexpectedtragedy, several people's lives are changedradically. Is someone seeking revenge for Valencia's alleged suicide. Arethe tragic events surrounding thelives of her closest acquaintances simply coincidental or were they the calculated actions of a dementedpsychopath?Inan intriguing story of jealousy, love, hate and deception, Pensacola Helene's electrifying new trilogy, SuddenSummer Breeze, takes you on a ride of mystery and suspenseall the way through to its surprising conclusion.
author: Pensacola Helene Jefferson
